verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I am the head and not the tail
I am above and not beneath
Distinguished by His glorious light
To stand up wherever I’m found
I am a carrier of His Glory
To show forth His praises on Earth
His glory is risen upon me

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I am the head and not the tail
I am above and not beneath
Distinguished by His glorious light
To stand up wherever I’m found
I am a carrier of His Glory
To show forth His praises on Earth
His glory is risen upon me

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
God has glorified me
The glory of the Lord is risen upon me
Glorified me …
God has glorified me
The glory of the Lord is risen upon me
Glorified me..

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Intro to Bridge
We are a royal priesthood
Yeah! Glory, Yeah; Glory, Yeah;
Can you sing it, Yeah, Glory…
Call: G L O
Resp: G-L-O-R-Y,
G-L-O-R-Y, G-L-O-R-Y- G
Glory…

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
PARTED BRIDGE
Call: G L O
Soprano: G-L-O-R-Y,
G-L-O-R-Y, G-L-O-R-Y- G
Glory…

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
G L O
Alto: G-L-O-R-Y,
G-L-O-R-Y, G-L-O-R-Y- G
Glory…

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
G L O
Tenor: G-L-O-R-Y,
G-L-O-R-Y, G-L-O-R-Y- G
Glory…

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines:
G L O
All: G-L-O-R-Y,
G-L-O-R-Y, G-L-O-R-Y- Glory…
GLORY….
